content: this is a pattern not a finished product this pattern is easy and quick to make and requires no sewing this is fast a hit both at craft shows and gifts teacher gifts stocking stuffers etc this pdf will be available as an instant digital download after purchase it it written in english and is one pdf that is 3 pages long difficulty beginner size approximately 3 x 3 5 materials 3 5-4 00 mm crochet hook a marble worsted weight yarn of your choosing this pattern is for personal use only you may not copy alter or sell this pattern selling items made with this pattern is permitted but please give me credit where possible this pattern is non refundable
